languages.text: "Прежде всего — вести о ваших подданных. В ваше отсутствие слуги династии фон Валанциус не покладая рук трудились на ваше благо и на преуспеяние всего торгового протектората".

"First and foremost, I have news about your subjects. In the time that you were gone, the servants of House von Valancius have toiled tirelessly in their service to you and for the benefit of the entire trade protectorate."
languages.original_text: "Прежде всего — вести о ваших подданных. В ваше отсутствие слуги династии фон Валанциус не покладая рук трудились на ваше благо и на преуспеяние всего торгового протектората".

traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "First and foremost, I have news about your subjects. In the time that you were gone, the servants of House von Valancius have toiled tirelessly in their service to you and for the benefit of the entire trade protectorate."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "First and foremost, I have news about your subjects. In the time that you were gone, the servants of House von Valancius have toiled tirelessly in their service to you and for the benefit of the entire trade protectorate."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: “首先，我想告知关于您臣民的相关消息。您离开的这段时间里，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的仆人们不知疲倦地为您服务，为整个贸易王朝的利益服务。”
languages.original_text: "First and foremost, I have news about your subjects. In the time that you were gone, the servants of House von Valancius have toiled tirelessly in their service to you and for the benefit of the entire trade protectorate."

traits.locale_text: “首先，我想告知关于您臣民的相关消息。您离开的这段时间里，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的仆人们不知疲倦地为您服务，为整个贸易王朝的利益服务。”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Zunächst einmal habe ich Neuigkeiten zu Euren Untertanen. In Eurer Abwesenheit haben die Diener des Hauses Valancius unermüglich geschuftet, Euch zu Ehren und zum Wohl des gesamten Handelsprotektorats."
languages.original_text: "First and foremost, I have news about your subjects. In the time that you were gone, the servants of House von Valancius have toiled tirelessly in their service to you and for the benefit of the entire trade protectorate."

traits.locale_text: "Zunächst einmal habe ich Neuigkeiten zu Euren Untertanen. In Eurer Abwesenheit haben die Diener des Hauses Valancius unermüglich geschuftet, Euch zu Ehren und zum Wohl des gesamten Handelsprotektorats."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: « Pour commencer, j'ai des nouvelles de vos sujets. Pendant votre absence, les serviteurs de la maison von Valancius ont travaillé sans relâche pour le bien de tout le protectorat commercial. »
languages.original_text: "First and foremost, I have news about your subjects. In the time that you were gone, the servants of House von Valancius have toiled tirelessly in their service to you and for the benefit of the entire trade protectorate."

traits.locale_text: « Pour commencer, j'ai des nouvelles de vos sujets. Pendant votre absence, les serviteurs de la maison von Valancius ont travaillé sans relâche pour le bien de tout le protectorat commercial. »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: «En primer lugar, tengo noticias sobre sus súbditos. Durante su ausencia, los sirvientes de la casa von Valancius han trabajado incansablemente para servirle y para beneficiar a su protectorado al completo».
languages.original_text: "First and foremost, I have news about your subjects. In the time that you were gone, the servants of House von Valancius have toiled tirelessly in their service to you and for the benefit of the entire trade protectorate."

traits.locale_text: «En primer lugar, tengo noticias sobre sus súbditos. Durante su ausencia, los sirvientes de la casa von Valancius han trabajado incansablemente para servirle y para beneficiar a su protectorado al completo».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: 「まず第一に、あなたの臣下についてお知らせしたいことがあります。あなたが不在の間、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の従者たちは、あなたのため、そして通商保護領全体の利益のために、たゆまぬ努力を続けてきました」
languages.original_text: "First and foremost, I have news about your subjects. In the time that you were gone, the servants of House von Valancius have toiled tirelessly in their service to you and for the benefit of the entire trade protectorate."

traits.locale_text: 「まず第一に、あなたの臣下についてお知らせしたいことがあります。あなたが不在の間、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の従者たちは、あなたのため、そして通商保護領全体の利益のために、たゆまぬ努力を続けてきました」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Öncelikle tebaanızla ilgili haberleri bildirmek isterim. Von Valancius Hanesi'nin hizmetkârları, siz yokken şahsınıza ve tüm ticaret protektorasına yarar sağlamak için dur durak bilmeden çalıştı."
languages.original_text: "First and foremost, I have news about your subjects. In the time that you were gone, the servants of House von Valancius have toiled tirelessly in their service to you and for the benefit of the entire trade protectorate."
